Sequence Information.Structure Description: All of the four Cys residues were deleted from the primary structure of AMP.

Literature.Title: Structure, activity and interactions of the cysteine deleted analog of tachyplesin-1 with lipopolysaccharide micelle Mechanistic insights into outer-membrane permeabilization and endotoxin neutralization.
Literature.Author: Saravanan R, Mohanram H, Joshi M, Domadia PN, Torres J, Ruedl C, Bhattacharjya S.
